newsitem.title: GERMANY: German shares end bourse trade at higher levels.
newsitem.headline: German shares end bourse trade at higher levels.

text.p: 1156 GMT - German shares end bourse trade strongly ahead on Monday, shrugging off earlier declines as market floundered on victory for the French left-wing in Sunday's poll and as the Bundesbank/Waigel row over assets revaluation continued apace. Strong support, and the main impetus behind much of the index's gains comes from the dollar at 1.7242/49 marks.
* 30-share DAX index ends at 3,605.62 points, up 57.78 points or 1.63 percent.
* June DAX future at 3,616.5 points, up 53.5.
* Strong dollar lifts export-oriented stocks - chemicals, carmakers.
